channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hyperkin The Competitor Controller Review: A DualSense Copycat
item.description: This copycat controller can’t clone the PS5’s best features, but it’s a solid option for Xbox and PC gamers.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 is tipped to get satellite and gaming boosts — but the pricing remains a mystery
item.description: We're getting a better idea of what to expect from the Samsung Galaxy S26, but the price is very much to be confirmed.

item.title: LG Gram 17 : un ultraportable à la config survitaminé (Ultra 7, 32 Go de RAM, 2 To SSD) frôle la ristourne de 50%
item.description: Le LG Gram 17 est un portable taillé pour les nomades créatifs : une configuration qui malmène une large partie de la concurrence et une légèreté qui flirte sans complexe avec les MacBook d’Apple. Et pour couronner le tout, son prix fond aujourd’hui à 1 232 euros au lieu de 2 299 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: 24TB Seagate external hard drive drops to $279.99 — perfect for huge backups and big data lakes
item.description: With an impressive 24TB capacity, you can grab a great deal on Seagate's Expansion desktop hard drive

item.title: The Environmental and Human Rights Costs of China’s Clean Energy Investments Abroad
item.description: Chinese companies have pledged hundreds of billions of dollars in clean energy manufacturing investments overseas, but the projects are having significant social, environmental, and human rights impacts.

item.title: The 48 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Stranger Things, City of Shadows, and Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: I upgraded my old 4K TV to the gorgeous, glowing TCL C8K – but there is one thing I miss
item.description: I swapped my big brand TV for one from a challenger brand – and here’s why I think you should too.

item.title: I’m ditching true wireless earbuds for these bargain Chinese IEMs in 2026 – here's why
item.description: If you think hi-fi brands have stopped caring about sound, it’s time to head to China – that's my plan for 2026, at least.

item.title: True Detective season 5: everything we know so far about the hit HBO Max show's return
item.description: True Detective season 5 is officially on the way – here's everything we know about the hit HBO Max show's return.

item.title: Tuft & Needle Original Hybrid Mattress Review: A Soft Landing
item.description: Choosing a mattress for your guest room, Airbnb, or VRBO rental is challenging. This hybrid is up for it.

item.title: Test souris HP 785M : la MX Master à la sauce HP
item.description: HP vient chatouiller Logitech sur le segment des souris dédiées à la productivité avec le modèle 785M, qui semble s’inspirer en tous points de l’excellente MX Master 4. Pâle copie ou concurrente sérieuse ?

item.title: So Long, GPT-5. Hello, Qwen
item.description: In the AI boom, chatbots and GPTs come and go quickly. (Remember Llama?) GPT-5 had a big year, but 2026 will be all about Qwen.

item.title: In Cryptoland, Memecoin Fever Gives Way to a Stablecoin Boom
item.description: In a year that began with a memecoin trading frenzy, stablecoins have emerged as the respectable face of the crypto industry.

item.title: I’m an AI expert – here are my top 5 secret tools that could change your life in 2026
item.description: I test AI tools for a living –and while ChatGPT and Gemini are great for many things, these five are better assistants for everything from finances to cooking.

item.title: I'm slashing my streaming bills by 56% in 2026 – here's my five-step masterplan
item.description: Five ways to cut the cost of Netflix, Disney+ and more by selectively subscribing and cutting unnecessary options.

item.title: Zillow updates its home price forecast across 400-plus housing markets
item.description: Zillow slightly upgrades its national home price outlook—predicting that over the next 12 months, U.S. home prices are likely to rise 2%. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.
